description:
goauth2: add -auth -token -redirect, and -ap flags
allowing the example to work with other OAuth2 providers
Tested with Microsoft, Google, and Meetup

messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goauth2

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/goauth2/source/detail?r=76d44ce1c666 ***

goauth2: add -auth -token -redirect, and -ap flags
allowing the example to work with other OAuth2 providers
Tested with Microsoft, Google, and Meetup

R=adg
